ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend it, since the material presented in class is very useful for the students of Italian literature. Futurism usually is a little bit neglected and Professor Larkin helped us to understand its importance also on a international level.

I would recommend this course to a fellow student because it allows you to see different aspects of Futurism that are normally ignored by the critics.Thanks to this class and to Prof. Larkin I now have a completely different and more deep understanding of what Furturism is. I really enjoy working on it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This class was very helpful for my coursework since it covered a great gap in my knowledge of Italian Literature.
This course helped me fill a gap I had in my knowledge of Italian Literature. I now feel that I understand Futurism much better, and that I may have discovered a new field of research for my future.
